alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 7:12PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Georgetown, Horry and south central Marion Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 711 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Brittons Neck to near Winyah Bay Entrance. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Conway, North Myrtle Beach, Georgetown, DeBordieu Colony, Surfside Beach, Pawleys Island, Myrtle Beach Airport, Yawkey South Island, Murrells Inlet, Winyah Bay Entrance, Socastee, Red Hill, Garden City, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Horry, Loris, Hickory Grove, Nixonville and Barefoot Landing Area Of North Myrtle Beach. This includes the following highways... SC Highway 31 between mile markers 5 and 21. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 1 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Northern Horry
